result.markdown: --- title: "Week 1: R IDEs, and workflow tools" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Main reference * [1-3, *Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/foundations-intro.html) ## What you will learn this week * What makes R different from other programming languages * Differences between RStudio and Positron * Integration of GitHub and version control in R IDEs * Integration of AI tools in R IDEs * Sources of R packages: CRAN, Bioconductor, GitHub * Scalars and vectors * Lists and data frames ## Slides for week Download pdf ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Tuesday 31 March.
